Graphic Options.Auto Detail Framerate#: Details and visible vehicles will be automatically reduced (by up to half) if framerate is under this threshold (0 to disable)
Graphic Options.Environment Reflections#: Off/Low/HIgh = live cubic mapping is used (if track and car are setup properly)
Graphic Options.Garage Detail#: LOD multiplier when vehicle is in garage (0.01-1.00)
Graphic Options.Max Headlights#: Max headlights visible relative to your car.
Graphic Options.Rearview_Back_Clip#: Back plane distance for mirror (0.0 = use default for scene)
Graphic Options.Rain FX Quality#: If 1, enable rain drops, if >1 enable rain effects from Low to High
Graphic Options.Rearview Driving#: 0=Off, 1=Center+Sides, 2=Center, 3=Sides (virtual mirrors only, in-car mirrors are on/off), applies to nosecam, cockpit, and TV cockpit
Graphic Options.Road Reflections#: Off/Low/High = reflected objects are generated for wet road and heat mirage
Graphic Options.Texture Filter#: Texture Filtering level: 0 = bilinear, 1 = trilinear, 2 = X2 AF, 3 = X4 AF, 4 = X8 AF, 5 = X16 AF

Graphic Options.Auto Detail Framerate#: Details and visible vehicles will be automatically reduced (by up to half) if framerate is under this threshold (0 to disable)
Graphic Options.Environment Reflections#: Off/Low/HIgh = live cubic mapping is used (if track and car are setup properly)
Graphic Options.Garage Detail#: LOD multiplier when vehicle is in garage (0.01-1.00)
Graphic Options.Max Headlights#: Max headlights visible relative to your car.
Graphic Options.Rain FX Quality#: If 1, enable rain drops, if >1 enable rain effects from Low to High
Graphic Options.Rearview Driving#: 0=Off, 1=Center+Sides, 2=Center, 3=Sides (virtual mirrors only, in-car mirrors are on/off), applies to nosecam, cockpit, and TV cockpit
Graphic Options.Road Reflections#: Off/Low/High = reflected objects are generated for wet road and heat mirage
Graphic Options.Texture Filter#: Texture Filtering level: 0 = bilinear, 1 = trilinear, 2 = X2 AF, 3 = X4 AF, 4 = X8 AF, 5 = X16 AF

Graphic Options.Auto Detail Framerate#: Details and visible vehicles will be automatically reduced (by up to half) if framerate is under this threshold (0 to disable)
Graphic Options.Environment Reflections#: Off/Low/HIgh = live cubic mapping is used (if track and car are setup properly)
Graphic Options.Garage Detail#: LOD multiplier when vehicle is in garage (0.01-1.00)
Graphic Options.Max Headlights#: Max headlights visible relative to your car.
Graphic Options.Rain FX Quality#: If 1, enable rain drops, if >1 enable rain effects from Low to High
Graphic Options.Rearview Driving#: 0=Off, 1=Center+Sides, 2=Center, 3=Sides (virtual mirrors only, in-car mirrors are on/off), applies to nosecam, cockpit, and TV cockpit
Graphic Options.Road Reflections#: Off/Low/High/Ultra = reflected objects are generated for wet road and heat mirage
Graphic Options.Texture Filter#: Texture Filtering level: 0 = bilinear, 1 = trilinear, 2 = X2 AF, 3 = X4 AF, 4 = X8 AF, 5 = X16 AF

Graphic Options.Car Vibration Mult1#: Primary engine vibration multiplier affects position of cameras attached directly to the car
Graphic Options.Cockpit Vibration Mult1#: Primary aerodynamic vibration multiplier affects eyepoint position (base magnitude is in VEH or cockpit file)
Graphic Options.Environment Reflections#: Off/Low/HIgh = live cubic mapping is used (if track and car are setup properly)
Graphic Options.Exaggerate Yaw#: Visually exaggerates the heading angle of the vehicle by rotating the head (which may improve "feel")
Graphic Options.Garage Detail#: LOD multiplier when vehicle is in garage (0.01-1.00)
Graphic Options.Head Physics#: Fraction of head physics movement applied to cockpit view (position AND rotation)
Graphic Options.Look Roll Angle#: Angle to lean head (roll) w/ controller in radians (= degrees / 57)
Graphic Options.Look Up/Down Angle#: Angle to look up/down (pitch) w/ controller in radians (= degrees / 57)
Graphic Options.Max Headlights#: Max headlights visible relative to your car.
Graphic Options.Rearview_Back_Clip#: Back plane distance for mirror (0.0 = use default for scene)

Graphic Options.Road Reflections#: Off/Low/High = reflected objects are generated for wet road and heat mirage
Graphic Options.Texture Filter#: Texture Filtering level: 0 = bilinear, 1 = trilinear, 2 = X2 AF, 3 = X4 AF, 4 = X8 AF, 5 = X16 AF

Graphic Options.Road Reflections#: Off/Low/High = reflected objects are generated for wet road and heat mirage
Graphic Options.Texture Filter#: Texture Filtering level: 0 = bilinear, 1 = trilinear, 2 = X2 AF, 3 = X4 AF, 4 = X8 AF, 5 = X16 AF

Sound Options.Other Volume Ratio#: Additional volume multiplier for other vehicles
Sound Options.Player Volume Ratio#: Additional volume multiplier for player's vehicle

DRIVING AIDS.Auto Blip#: Whether to automatically blip with manual shifting but auto-clutch (non-semiautomatic trans only)
DRIVING AIDS.Auto Lift#: Whether to automatically lift with manual shifting but auto-clutch (non-semiautomatic trans only)
DRIVING AIDS.Auto Shift Override Time#: How long after an automatic shift before user is allowed to manually shift
DRIVING AIDS.Hold Brakes#: When you enter the vehicle, hold brakes until it is shifted out of neutral
DRIVING AIDS.Hold Clutch On Start#: For auto-shifting only: whether to hold clutch for standing start (to allow revving without moving)
DRIVING AIDS.Steering Help#: Now 3 levels, although full level now comes with a weight penalty by default
